attributes.action: Arrange a new general election ASAP
attributes.additional_details: The general consensus of the UK population is against these items on the chancellors mini-budget. Why should the top earners, bankers etc get more money when they are the ones consistently putting the UK in recessions through bad investments and the like. The government shows no respect for the workforce as a whole or the frontliners who worked right through the covid pandemic. It's disgraceful
attributes.background: To acknowledge that the bankers bonuses increase, abolishing income tax on earners above £150k is detrimental to the majority of the workforce within the UK. This is escalated by the wish to remove trade unions. The workforce should be looked after first and foremost to make the UK prosper.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
